Reviews.Title: Looks cheap but works Great....
Reviews.Author: N. Fede
Reviews.Content: I use the every day in my shop for a second security monitor. Works great. Not a hicup.Two years now and still works great!

Reviews.Title: Damn Good Product
Reviews.Author: MacDhai
Reviews.Content: Bought this a year and a half ago, runs constantly with my Sony hi-res Color and night vision Security cameras to a Samsung LCD Monitor... All I can say is that if all electronic products were this reliable, what a world it would be. This thing gives me beautiful hi-res images, is simple to hook up and use, and is flawless in it's performance and durability! Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Plug and Play
Reviews.Author: A. Camper
Reviews.Content: Worked exactly as advertised. No problems, plugged it in and it worked.Installed about 1 month now.Great product for the price.

Reviews.Title: My client's cctv monitor died. This allowed me to use a computer monitor and it looks great
Reviews.Author: Ruben Miranda
Reviews.Content: I was always sceptical of these products, expecting blurry poor quality images.It did the job for me and I would recommend it to others.
